items.summary: In `frontend/src/components/Courses.tsx`, update the 'Enroll Now' button href for the PANCHANG & REMEDIES COURSE to 'https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfYBQDmcnAag5e_Hj22ACr9mIsYnioe9DuAkBdGDotXLZC1Ow/viewform', replacing the previous Google Form link.
